name: Olgob The Bold
description:
Olgob The Bold is a Metroidvania Soulslike by a solo dev.

The story of an orc from a small tribe in the Greenskin Barrens. From a blue-collar, working-class family, hunting down billionaire Bear Lords who have taken control of the world by exploiting the labour of poor orcs.

Ruling with cruel taxes up to 75% for small business owners. And letting their bear friends register companies in tax havens in the Forgotten Lands. Olgob is the Strong Orc Leader they need to come and fix all their problems.

Play and help Olgob give power back to the people by overthrowing the government of the oppressive Bear Lords.



Join Olgob on his journey through the Mutating Castle to collect 20 bear asses for a stranger in the woods...

That is it. This is your quest. The only quest you have in this game. Just the one. Collect 20 bear asses.

Mutating Castle


Players will traverse the Mutating Castle with interconnected areas, and changing pathways. Your world will change as you progress through the story.

Story and Lore Rich World


Discover the origin and story of the Bear Lords and their ascension as you piece together the secrets of the Mutating Castle.

Slow Deliberate Combat


Nothing is claimed easily. You will scratch and claw to victory every step of the way. You may say it is... just like Dark Souls.

Colorful Cast of NPCs


This game is all about the power of friendship. if you cannot do something alone, there is always someone who you can passively talk to and they will do nothing.



I plan on releasing free DLCs depending on how well this does.
You can contact me at crabjuicegaming@gmail.com regarding any issues you may encounter in the game.
